Kin Tsuchi controls a vast amount of needles at once using strings, and attacks the enemy. When shown in the game, this technique resembles a white version of Haku's [[Thousand Flying Water Needles of Death]].

[[es:Mil Agujas de la Muerte]]
[[pl:Tysiąc Igieł Śmierci]]
